node.title: Gemotest.ru
node.content:

node.title: Ticketland.ru
node.role: Fullstack web developer, Teamlead, Head of Webdev
node.content:
Another highload with lot of B2B APIs and big internal infrastructure.

Got experience with:

  • Yii 1,2
  • Sybase + Couchbase + Redis + MongoDB
  • RabbitMQ
  • Sphinx
  • Node.js + React.js
  • RESTfull microservices + Docker
  • Agile/Scrum + Codereview + E2E testing + Gitlab CI
